product_name: I Dew CareHydra Vibes 3 - Hyaluronic Acid Cleanser
summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsCruelty FreeVeganSustainable PackagingCleanse, Refresh and Replenish Skin's Moisture Barrier! I Dew Care 3-Hydra Vibes 10-Hyaluronic Acid Cleanser removes makeup and excess oil, infused with 3 distinct molecular weights of Hyaluronic Acid and Hydrangea Leaf Extract. This cleanser leaves skin feeling refreshed, softer, and hydrated.
details: DetailsFeaturesCream-to-foam cleanserRemoves dirt and impurities, including makeup and sunscreenInfused with 3 different molecular weights of HA to hydrate different layers of the skinDermatologically TestedKey IngredientsJeju Hydrangea: hydrates and soothes skin3-Hyaluronic Acid: deeply moisturizes and plumps skin for a fresh and radiant complexionFormulated WithoutAlcoholParabensPhthalatesItem 2619901How To UseSqueeze and massage on wet face in circular motions.Rinse thoroughly with clean water.Use daily. AM & PM.IngredientsWater, Glycerin, Myristic Acid, Butylene Glycol, Potassium Hydroxide, Lauric Acid, Palmitic Acid, Stearic Acid, Polyglyceryl-3 Distearate, Potassium Cocoyl Glycinate, Glyceryl Stearate Se, Hydrangea Macrophylla Leaf Extract, Hyaluronic Acid (166 Ppb), Hydrolyzed Hyaluronic Acid (3 Ppb), Sodium Hyaluronate (1 Ppb), Allantoin, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Glyceryl Stearate Citrate, Melia Azadirachta Leaf Extract, Melia Azadirachta Flower Extract, Coccinia Indica Fruit Extract, Solanum Melongena (Eggplant) Fruit Extract, Aloe Barbadensis Flower Extract, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil, Ocimum Sanctum Leaf Extract, Curcuma Longa (Turmeric) Root Extract, Corallina Officinalis Extract, Ethylhexylglycerin, Sodium Methyl Cocoyl Taurate, Sodium Chloride, Polyquaternium-7, Disodium Edta, Sodium Benzoate, 1,2-Hexanediol, Fragrance, Hexyl Cinnamal.
how_to_use: Squeeze and massage on wet face in circular motions.Rinse thoroughly with clean water.Use daily. AM & PM.

reviews.headline: Great Cleanser! Must buy
reviews.comments: I was looking for an affordable cleanser and I actually picked this one up at Ross. And I was blown away with how amazing it was on my skin! I will be buying this at ulta once I run out! AMAZING

reviews.headline: Very strong smell
reviews.comments: I wanted to love this but the scent is so overpowering. Like the most fake floral perfume I've ever smelled. If you can get past that then go for it but I cannot.

reviews.headline: Favorite cleanser
reviews.comments: This is one of the best cleansers i have ever used. I use it at least 3 times a week along with other cleansers, it keeps my skin so soft and hydrated. I definitely dont think its for every skin type but it works soooo well for my dry skin. I definitely will repurchase many times, its not a staple in my skincare routine.

reviews.headline: The cure after 10 years of struggles
reviews.comments: I came across this line by random chance after receiving it in a three piece trial. Immediately after using the trial, I went on the line and ordered the set. I have struggled with skin issues for about 10 years now. Even though I no longer get acne, I'm constantly struggling with dullness, large pores, and oiliness, all while my skin feels dry and tight. I flipped through many different drugstore face washes that I thought I liked, but never got better results. After using this line for the first time, I immediately noticed a difference in my skins brightness and texture. When I get out of the shower, my skin no longer feels tight and like it's going to crack. It gives me a glow with the softest feeling skin. Overall, my skin just looks and feels so much healthier. I love the creaminess of the face wash and how well it lathers. A little really goes a long way with all three of the products in this line. After about a month of using all three in this line, I went to get my eyebrows done by my aesthetician, and she immediately asked me when I was doing different on my skin and complimented how well it looked. After 10 years, I feel like I finally found something that is a game changer for me at a reasonable price.

reviews.headline: Love this cleanser! Only one I will use now
reviews.comments: I tried this product out on a whim, and love it. It's extremely concentrated so a small amount goes a long way-and it's proven to be very gentle on skin while still feeling clean. My daughter has sensitive skin and she is able to use it as well!

reviews.headline: Best cleanser I have ever used
reviews.comments: This makes your skin feel so soft in a way i cant even explain. This makes your skin so pretty and your makeup will look so smooth agter using it for like a week. I never write reviews but this is the real deal.

reviews.headline: Best cleanser I have ever used
reviews.comments: This makes your skin feel so soft in a way i cant even explain. This makes your skin so pretty and your makeup will look so smooth agter using it for like a week. I never write reviews but this is the real deal.

reviews.headline: Dried out my skin
reviews.comments: I have combination skin and this dried out my skin. I was shocked because no cleanser I've used has done this and my skin isn't too sensitive. This cleanser leaves your face squeaky clean (not in a good way) and strips the moisture from your skin. There is also a tad bit of perfume-y fragrance. Not a fan and I'm not even picky with cleansers.

reviews.headline: Not a cream cleanser.
reviews.comments: Cream cleansers are not supposed to suds up, this straight up smells like plain old soap and leaves skin very squeeky, as in stripped. If you are after what is generally agreed upon as a cream cleanser, this is not it. It also takes a while to rinse off as it is very saponic, so please use a toner to return your skin to its optimum pH to restore the acid mantle.

reviews.headline: Love this cleanser
reviews.comments: I received this product gifted by idewcare. This has definitely become one of my favorite cleansers. First the smell is amazing it's so refreshing. It's a great gentle and moisturizing cleanser and pairs so nice with my clarifying cleanser. Plus because it has hyaluronic acid in it I don't have to reach for my hyaluronic serum. Love it!!

reviews.headline: Dry Skin Everyday Cleanser
reviews.comments: I received the new hydra vibes cleanser complimentary from I Dew Care in exchange for my honest opinion. I have dry skin so I love a hydrating cleanser that doesn't strip my skin down of all the natural oils. This was a very gentle and effective hydrating cleanser. It has a great lather and it's very refreshing yet plumping to the skin. Definitely great hydration for the skin barrier. I highly recommend this for dry skin even if sensitive.

reviews.headline: It's ok!
reviews.comments: I received this complimentary from iDewCare. Overall, I like this cleanser so far! I have acne prone skin and haven't had any negative reactions to it so far. However, this cleanser isn't super hydrating so if you have dry skin there are better options out there. But, if you have combo/oily skin and don't want your skin to feel super stripped, then this would be a good option for you!

reviews.headline: Love
reviews.comments: I really like this cleanser it does a great job at both cleansing my face and removing any makeup I have on for the day. I've been using this cleaner everyday at night and my skin feels so soft afterwards. Offered by ideware

reviews.headline: Love
reviews.comments: Recently, instantly switched out my face wash for this one. It felt good going on, and there was no reaction from the change. I do feel like my skin looks glow and it feels soft after I wash. Really like this! Gifted by idewcare

reviews.headline: Does both
reviews.comments: I've been looking for a good cleanser that will do both: remove my makeup and deeply clean my skin. This product does a great job at both and leaves my skin soft and smooth. I love that it's affordable too. It was gifted to me by idewcare.

reviews.headline: Great for dry skin!
reviews.comments: This was gifted by idewcare. I wish I would've had this 2 months ago because it would've been great for my dry winter skin! One wash and my skin felt like I'd already done my entire skincare routine because my skin felt so hydrated. This cleanser also left a very squeaky clean kind of feel. I don't usually go for this on days my skin feels a little more oily, but for dry days it's a must!

reviews.headline: Love it but does leave a weird texture
reviews.comments: Gifted by idewcare Such a great cleanser. Leaves my face feeling clean and fresh. I love how it lathers on my skin . It is not drying on my skin at all. One thing I don't like is it does leave a weird texture. It's hard to explain but kind of feels the same as when I wash my face with bar soap. Doesn't stop me from using it though , lol.

reviews.headline: Helped my cystic acne!!
reviews.comments: This product gifted by idewcare truly couldn't have come at a better time for me. I recently an unexpected breakout of cystic acne across my cheeks that wouldn't settle and after only a week of twice daily use, I noticed a significant improvement! Three weeks later, and the acne is all but gone - the gentle yet effective cleanser diminished all my redness and kept oils under control, stopping further spread of the acne. I'm still using Hydra Vibes cleanser daily and couldn't be happier with the current state of my skin !!

reviews.headline: Love
reviews.comments: I'm loving this cleanser. I was in need of something to use in the mornings before makeup, and this delivers. Doesn't leave a film or anything after use, and smells really good! My skin feels refreshed, soft and ready to take on the day. Offered by idewcare

reviews.headline: Creamy Cleanser, Hydrating Results
reviews.comments: I recently tried out this cleanser that I was offered by idewcare in exchange for a review, and I must say, I'm impressed. Its thick consistency is just what I prefer, and the cream-to-foam transition is delightful. With a good lather, I know my skin is in for a treat. Not only does it cleanse effectively, but it also leaves my face feeling hydrated and smooth, without any stripping sensation. Overall, it's a win-win for me.

media.headline: feela gentle
media.caption: No limonene & lanolin which i'm sensitive to

media.headline: Love this cleanser thick and hydrating

faceoff_positive.comments: I received it complimentary in exchange for my honest review gifted by idewcare. The cleanser is gentle, which is great for my sensitive skin. However, I did notice that it doesn't provide as much hydration or plumping as I had hoped for.
faceoff_positive.headline: feela gentle

faceoff_negative.comments: As someone with dry skin, I was honestly pretty disappointed in this cleanser and feel like the name is misleading. This may have hyaluronic acid and hydrating ingredients, but this leaves my skin with an INTENSE, tight and dry, squeaky clean feeling. Some positives about this are that it smells good, and a very small amount goes a long way. The way a small amount bubbles up and increases in volume is impressive. I received this complimentary from idewcare (for free) in exchange for an honest review. I've been using this as more of a body wash to avoid the squeaky clean feeling on my face, and much prefer using it as a body cleanser.
faceoff_negative.headline: Intense "Squeaky Clean" Feel
